info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 28 at 3:31PM CDT until August 28 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR EASTERN WINNEBAGO COUNTY... At 331 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Roscoe to 6 miles south of Cherry Valley, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Rockford, Loves Park, Machesney Park, Roscoe, South Beloit, Rockton, Rockford Airport, Cherry Valley, Davis Junction and New Milford. This includes... Rock Cut State Park, Rock Valley College, Rockford Aviators Baseball, and Rockford Speedway. Including the following interstates... I-39 between mile markers 115 and 123. I-90 between mile markers 1 and 18. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
